overallSummary: Fabio Giglietto has a well-established presence across three major social media platforms, with a total of 3,580 followers. The engagement levels vary across platforms, reflecting a strong focus on academic and research-related content. LinkedIn emerges as the most engaging platform, likely due to the professional and academic nature of the posts.

contentThemes.description: Updates and announcements about research projects, grants, and publications.
Posts related to hiring and research opportunities within Fabio's team.
Information about upcoming conferences and presentations in the field of computational social science.

recommendations: Increase frequency of posts on LinkedIn to leverage high engagement rates.
Diversify content types by including more interactive elements such as polls or Q&A sessions.

platformInsights.mastodon: Mastodon posts focus on methodological discussions and tool releases, with moderate engagement levels.
platformInsights.linkedin: LinkedIn posts about research grants and job opportunities generate the highest engagement, indicating a strong professional network.
